sentence.Network_en: The pressure towards uniformity constantly threatens to erode local traditions.
sentence.Network_cn: 一体化的压力一直威胁着地方传统.

sentence.Network_en: Government inspections ensure a high degree of uniformity in the standard of service.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府检查确保了在服务标准方面的高度一致.

sentence.Network_en: We're all getting - lashed to the great wheel of uniformity.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们都被鞭子赶着进入那个千篇一律的大论了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1.目测试验(visual test): 用肉眼观测颜色，均匀性(uniformity)，光泽性(smoothness)，附着性(adhesion)从颜色及虹色(iridescence)可.
第三是统一性(uniformity)的原则。它主张实现某种普遍主义的秩序。
等速度 uniform velocity均匀度；均齐度 uniformity均匀度指数 uniformity index

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French uniformite or late Latin uniformitas, from Latin uniformis (see uniform)

encyclopedia.content: uniformity n. 同样， 一式， 一致， 均匀

entry.def: If there is uniformity in something such as a system, organization, or group of countries, the same rules, ideas, or methods are applied in all parts of it.

example.ex: Spanish liberals sought to create linguistic as well as administrative uniformity.
example.tran: 西班牙自由主义者寻求语言及行政上的统一。

example.ex: ...the strength of the ideology is seen in the remarkable uniformity of attitudes and beliefs.
example.tran: 从态度和信仰上的高度一致可以看出意识形态的力量

means.word_mean: 1. a condition in which everything is regular and unvarying
2. the quality of lacking diversity or variation (even to the point of boredom)

auth_sentence.content: The system of public examinations...ensures...a reasonable degree of uniformity.
auth_sentence.res_content: The system of public examinations...ensures...a reasonable degree of uniformity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The system of public examinations...ensures...a reasonable degree of uniformity.

auth_sentence.content: There seems to be no uniformity in the size of clothes.
auth_sentence.res_content: There seems to be no uniformity in the size of clothes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There seems to be no uniformity in the size of clothes.

auth_sentence.content: Data collection requires rules in order to ensure uniformity and fairness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Data collection requires rules in order to ensure uniformity and fairness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Data collection requires rules in order to ensure uniformity and fairness.

means.word_mean: 一致;单调;无差异;无变化; 相同; 统一
